title: Workshop for peace. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: United Nations. Office of Public Information, Ramakantha Sarma and Krishna Singh
brief_description: A tour of the United Nations building in New York, and an explanation of the function of the United Nations Organisation, the Secretariat, councils and agencies. Shows the unique architecture of the building and the vaious meeting halls. Narrated by John Grueh. Music by Ben Park.
